|brand = TP-LINK |model = TL-WR849N |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = (BR) |revision = v4.0 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = January 24, 2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK_TL-WR849N(BR)_v4.0 |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 2050500859 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7628NN; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 575 / 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q64CSIG; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = ESMT;M14D5121632A-2.5B; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = C0:25:E9 |oui = C0:25:E9
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.6 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = TP-LINK_XXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = LEDE Project, OpenWrt
|availability = End of Life |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''(Brasilian exclusiv model)''
"TL-WR849N(BR) Ver:4.0" is silkscreened on the sticker. :"2050500859" is silkscreened on the board.
===Registration=== *[https://fccid.io/ANATEL/00356-17-03177 ANATEL] Symbol and Number: :00356-17-03177 on outside sticker | photos *EC symbol on outside sticker *ROHS symbol on outside sticker *No FCC symbol or registration number inside or outside
===Specification=== :- SoC: [[MediaTek]] MT7628NN (580MHz) :- RAM: 64 MiB (ESMT M14D5121632A-2.5B) :- Flash: 8 MiB (GigaDevice GD25Q64CSIG) :- LAN: 4x 100M, WAN: 1x 100M :- Only five indicator LEDs: ::Power, Wi-Fi, LAN (one led for all ports), WAN, Lock (WPS) :- No separate hidden ''RESET'' button ::(only one normal joint WPS/RESET button) :- No Power On/Off switch
From specs could be compatible to TL-WR840 v4 {{see also|TP-LINK TL-WR840N v4|TP-LINK TL-WR841HP}}
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=70687 ''OpenWrt on TL-WR841N v13 or TL-WR840N v4'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] :<small>'''Note''': TL-WR840N v4 have 5 leds: power, wifi, lan (one led for all ports), wan, lock (wps) :::TL-WR841N v13 have 8 leds: power, wifi, lan4, lan3, lan2, lan1, wan, lock (wps)</small> :[https://github.com/lede-project/source/pull/974/commits/8706b608f4848940275cdb523e6bb85705769728 ''ramips: add initial support for TP-LINK TL-WR840N v4'']
===Alternate Firmware Support=== *LEDE Project (OpenWrt) - [https://lede-project.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_tl-wr849n_v4.0_br TP-Link TL-WR849N v4.0 (BR)] *DD-WRT - not yet for the specific model, may be compatible to others
===Other versions=== *[[TP-LINK TL-WR849N(BR) v4.0]] *[[TP-LINK TL-WR849N(BR) v5.0]] *[[TP-LINK TL-WR849N(BR) v6.0]] *[[TP-LINK TL-WR849N(BR) v6.20]]
